analysis.key_quote: Schedule F would allow any single person to wield power for political retribution without regard to the health of the department, fairness to the employee and maintaining the institutional knowledge required to have a functioning government.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to Schedule F by highlighting concerns about political retribution, fairness to employees, and the preservation of institutional knowledge, all of which align with the themes of politicization and merit-based systems.
